cause.description:
Our organization is a unique assembly of public health experts and healthcare providers who use our collective expertise to develop long-term, system-level improvements in healthcare delivery in impoverished areas.
----------------------------------------- Join our facebook Group at http://facebook.com/group.php?gid=5570272622 to discuss the issues and find out how you can get involved! ---------------------------------------
1. Nyaya Health runs a community health center in Nepal for a catchment population of a quarter million people.
2. The health center provides free services in the one of the poorest regions in South Asia, and treats over 100 patients per day.
3. Run by local Nepali staff, trained by foreign volunteers; includes mobile teams providing outreach, triage, treatment and follow up services.
4. Nyaya’s services are community-based and community-integrated; we form partnerships with the local government to develop infrastructure.
5. We are governed by community members and pursue a model of democracy for public health equity and high quality health services.
cause.mission: To improve the health of poor communities in Nepal through the provision of medical and public health services.
cause.name: Nyaya Health
